amendment.description: Amendment requires FEMA to conduct educational programs to better inform local communities of changes made in the flood insurance map.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 109-530 to create a program to educate the communities about the update to the flood insurance program rate map.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. E. B. Johnson.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. E. B. Johnson.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Johnson, E. B. amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
